posts.title: Palm Tree
posts.body: Palm trees are a botanical family of perennial lianas, shrubs, and trees. They are in the family Arecaceae. They grow in hot climates
posts.author: Tom

comments.comment: Palm trees are a botanical family of perennial lianas, shrubs, and trees. They are in the family Arecaceae. They grow in hot climates
Palm tree seeds are the highest level fruit tree patch seeds

posts.title: Neem Tree
posts.body: Neem (Azadirachta indica) is a tree in the mahogany family Meliaceae.
posts.author: Tom

comments.comment: The neem plant is a fast growing and long living tree

posts.title: Banyan Tree
posts.body: Banyan often refers specifically to the Indian banyan (Ficus benghalensis), which is the national tree of the Republic of India
posts.author: Mickey

comments.comment: The seeds of banyans are dispersed by fruit-eating birds
